0.1.2.en: Initial release of the Lidl Smart Home app for SDK3.

0.1.4.en: Door/Window Sensor and Motion Sensor added (old non working driver or door/window sensor removed).

0.1.5.en: Fix for Door/Window Sensor and Motion Sensor.

0.1.7.en: Added product brands to device names.

0.1.8.en: Fix for color lights. Already paired lights MUST be removed and paired again to get color/temperature functionality.

0.1.9.en: Fix for color white tunable (temperature) lights. Lights may have to be removed and paired again.

0.1.10.en: Added support for Mood Light and Light Bar.
